name: Breakout (itch) (XthevikingX)
description: This game was made as a school project by XthevikingX and Fazy_HB. The point of the game is to get the hostages to the exit and coins are an added bonus(currently coins have to purpose and you can't do anything with them, this may change in a future update). Have fun and if you have any feedback or ideas then please share them thanks. The game is made for android phones. The game has many bugs and we are fixing them.
